snippet.title: Hammer Vs Evil D in Soulfire (Unreleased MC Hammer Game For Sega CD in 1994)
snippet.description:
NOTE: All credit goes to GrooveRaider. This was originally on GrooveRaider's "Sega Welcome To The Next Level 1994" video that was posted last year.

Rapper MC Hammer had his own doll, and even his own saturday morning cartoon show!  Naturally, he would've moved on to having his own video game, but for some reason it was cancelled. This is a short demonstration of his unreleased action game "Hammer Vs. Evil D in Soulfire", which was developed by GTE Entertainment and was planned to be released in 1994 for the Sega CD system. 

According to the person who wrote an article about developing sprites for the game, the game was to take place during an apocalypse and it would've been Hammer going against zombie creatures what was to be known as the "soul suckers". It also probably would've had a side-scrolling gameplay as well. There's no mention about who the "Evil D" character is, so I would have to assume that the character would be a final boss in the game, I dunno. You can read about it here: http://www.mostfunnest.com/stop-hammer-time/

By the way, if anybody has a ROM dump to this game, PLEASE let me know because I would really like to play it!
